Description:
Detects the execution of the tool PowerTool which has the ability to kill a process, delete its process file, unload drivers, and delete the driver files

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - PowerTool Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (process_path like '%\powertool.exe' or process_path like '%\powertool64.exe') and original_file_name = 'powertool.exe'
